column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////I get a little anxious sharing food tapas style but this food was delicious! Almost worth the stress of having to share all of your food and then split your bill with a million people. Almost. Just kidding
column2: it's not worth it at all. But if you must because you're insane and hate simplicity
column3: the short ribs and goat cheese dip are good. Lots of wine choices too. They also have gluten free bread
column4: for your token friend who fakes a gluten allergy to justify eating mostly lettuce. I'll probably never go back
column5: because I can go literally anywhere else and keep all my food to myself
